title: Moderate-speed city driving on a clear day.
caption: The ego vehicle drives straight on a city street with moderate traffic.

reasoning: The ego vehicle maintains a moderate speed to ensure safe driving in the city. It keeps a safe distance from the red car in the opposite lane and adjusts its speed when approaching intersections or parked cars.
